amphibious.label: Amphibious
amphibious.desc: Moves at the same speed on all kinds of terrain.

barbedwire.label: Barbed Wire
barbedwire.desc: Slows movement to %50. Deals damage to enemies around it.

berserker.label: Berserker
berserker.desc: Melee with a long aggro range.

artillery.label: Artillery
artillery.desc: 8 range. Has +2 vision. Ground targets only.

connective.label: Connective
connective.desc: Half price when built next to friendly structures

club.label: Club
club.desc: Attacks ground targets at double speed.

grenade.label: Grenade
grenade.desc: Creates poisonous gas that does 3 damage to units per second. Last 15 seconds. Cannot target structures.

flamethrower.label: Flamethrower
flamethrower.desc: Ignites 10 tiles at 4 range. Each tile does ATK value over 1 second.

medic.label: Medic
medic.desc: Heal an ally unit at melee range for ATK value. Does not attack.

landmine.label: Landmine
landmine.desc: Detonates on collision after 0.25 seconds. Cannot be seen. Can be built anywhere!

minigun.label: Minigun
minigun.desc: Fires slowly, but reaches full damage over 4 seconds.

pistol.label: Pistol
pistol.desc: Attacks ground and FLYING targets at 4 range.

sniper.label: Sniper
sniper.desc: 6 range. Has +4 vision. Cannot target structures.

rapidartillery.label: Artillery
rapidartillery.desc: Shoots volleys of long range bullets at ground targets. +2 vision.

spear.label: Spear Throw
spear.desc: Attacks ground and FLYING targets at 2 range.

smg.label: Submachine Gun
smg.desc: Rapidly fires for 1.75 seconds, before reloading for .25 seconds.

stim.label: Stim
stim.desc: Buffs an allied structure or unit to operate twice as fast for 8 seconds. Cooldown 2 seconds. Does not buff self.

stealth.label: Stealth
stealth.desc: Cannot be seen or targeted by opponents unless attacking.

venomous.label: Venomous
venomous.desc: Spits a stacking poison at range that deals 1 damage per second for 15 seconds.

pistolsquirrel.label: Pistol
pistolsquirrel.desc: Attacks ground and FLYING targets at a 4 range.

pistolpig.label: Pistol
pistolpig.desc: Attacks ground and FLYING targets at a distance.

sniperfox.label: Sniper
sniperfox.desc: 6 range. Has +2 vision. Cannot target structures.

sniperballoon.label: Sniper
sniperballoon.desc: 6 range. Has +8 vision. Cannot target structures.

cabin.name: Cabin
cabin.desc: This be like, my home and all that.

campfire.name: Campfire
campfire.desc: This be like, my home and all that.

gristmill.name: Gristmill
gristmill.desc: This be like, my home and all that.

lizard.name: Lizard
lizard.label: Nomads of the North
lizard.desc: Immigrants from the tribal north wear furs to keep their cold blood running hot.

pigeon.name: Pigeon
pigeon.label: The Volunteers
pigeon.desc: At the onset of war, soldiers were too proud to consume the little white packets that fell from the skies.  Now they'll take anything they can get.

badger.name: Badger
badger.label: Inmate #43B
badger.desc: Her entire family was locked up under the pretense of criminal insanity. While in prison, said affliction became a reality.

toad.name: Toad
toad.label: Morning Light Croakers
toad.desc: True believers, the Morning Light Croakers often appear to regret their religious devotion just before fuse hits powder.

mole.name: Mole
mole.label: Engineers for Hire
mole.desc: Despite their name, the Engineers appear to be far better at knocking things over rather than building them up.

owl.name: Owl
owl.label: The Matriark
owl.desc: The Family does not suffer disloyalty: Traitors are eaten.  But the Matriark is not without pity.  The repentant are regurgitated for one last chance to serve.

squirrel.name: Squirrel
squirrel.label: The Distillery Brothers
squirrel.desc: Conscripted into service and certain of their doom, the untrained Distillery Brothers charge into battle fueled by fermented acorn courage.

boar.name: Boar
boar.label: Uncle Butter
boar.desc: Before the war, he was known as the country's greatest gourmand.  Uncle Butter still cooks his meat, but he no longer kills his prey first.

fox.name: Fox
fox.label: Kasha, Farmhand
fox.desc: She spent her summers sitting on the roof, picking off rustlers and interlopers.  She hates the city, and is happy to be back at home in the countryside.

chameleon.name: Chameleon
chameleon.label: The Trench Gang
chameleon.desc: Nobody crosses the Trench Gang.  Nobody.  Well, some have crossed the Trench Gang.  But only once.  Don't cross the Trench Gang.

ferret.name: Ferret
ferret.label: The Freight Union
ferret.desc: Customers beware: While the Freight Union guarantees speedy delivery, their contract provides no warranty on the state of goods upon shipment.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.label: Drill Sergeant Volkov
wolf.desc: A shy bureaucrat before the war, Drill Sergeant Volkov uncovered a side to his personality that no one knew was there: He now inspires unmitigated devotion and fear.

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.label: Wing Demons
falcon.desc: An all-male detachment of aerial combat specialists, the cocky Wing Demons compete for kills, food, and female companionship.

snake.name: Snake
snake.label: Tooth Collectors
snake.desc: When debts are not paid, the Tooth Collectors arrive.  When no teeth remain, venom is the only way.

skunk.name: Skunk
skunk.label: The Glorious AFB
skunk.desc: Previously unwelcome in high society, the Glorious AFB's silent tactics were so deadly that they became awkward national heroes.

barbedwire.name: Barbed Wire
barbedwire.label: Feather Wire
barbedwire.desc: Legend has it that the first shipment of barbed wire was mislabeled, "Feathers" by an overworked Operator. The name stuck ever since.

artillery.name: Artillery
artillery.label: Drumfire Cannon
artillery.desc: After the Operators were forced to close the artillery shell factories, they resorted to loading Drumfire cannons with the bones of their enemies.

balloon.name: Balloon
balloon.label: Thermal Airsniper
balloon.desc: There's an old saying among Balloon Operators: "Stay alert, stay on target, and never, ever, look down."

landmine.name: Landmine
landmine.label: Tremormine
landmine.desc: The portraits on top of tremormines memorialize fallen Operators. No Operator goes down without a fight, and none rests without revenge.

machinegun.name: Turret
machinegun.label: Bullet Hive
machinegun.desc: Future generations will find great riches in the battlefields where bullet casings from the Bullet Hives stacked many heads deep.
